Index.themos_description: You just live in the wrong country.

Dashboard.dashboard_migrate_to_label: I would like to migrate to:
Dashboard.dashboard_canada_pros: 💵 High salaries for doctors, engineers and nurses.🏥 Free Healthcare.🚈 Public Services.👮🏻‍♂️ Safe.
Dashboard.dashboard_canada_cons: High Taxes.High cost of living.Taxed extra hours.
Dashboard.dashboard_usa_pros: 💵 High salaries for doctors, engineers, nurses, lawyers and entrepreneurs.🤑 Great to make money.🖥️ Great to build businesses.👷🏻‍♂️ Business friendly people.🦅 Freedom
Dashboard.dashboard_usa_cons: Expensive Healthcare.Some states have high taxes.Not the safest.
Dashboard.dashboard_spain_pros: 🍷 Good work/life balance.🏥 Free Healthcare.🚈 Public Services.👮🏻‍♂️ Safe.
Dashboard.dashboard_germany_pros: 🍷 Good work/life balance.🏥 Free Healthcare.🚈 Public Services.
Dashboard.dashboard_germany_cons: Hard language.High cost of living.High Taxes.Unfriendly people.

Migrate_To.migrate_describe_label: Why would you like to move to Canada? Explain us in detail your case.
